import Chart from "chart.js"; import classnames from "classnames"; import pflImage from "../assets/img/machine.png"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Bar, Line, Pie, Doughnut } from "react-chartjs-2"; import { Badge } from "reactstrap"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, CardTitle, Col, Container, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Progress, Row, Table, } from "reactstrap"; import { doughnutOptions } from "./chartOptions.js"; const Machine = (props) => { const [selectedPage, setSelectedPage] = useState("OEE_UPH"); const oeeValue = 50; const doughnutData = { datasets: [ { data: [oeeValue, 100 - oeeValue], backgroundColor: ["#051548", "#33FAFF"], // Blue for OEE, light gray for remaining }, ], labels: ["OEE", "Target"], }; const handlePageChange = (page) => { setSelectedPage(page); }; const renderOeeUphContent = () => ( <>

); const renderLiveContent = () => ( <>

); return ( <>
handlePageChange("OEE_UPH")} > OEE & UPH handlePageChange("Live")} > Live
{selectedPage === "OEE_UPH" ? renderOeeUphContent() : renderLiveContent()} ); }; export default Machine;
